Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.IAeStandardSchemaResolver

Packages that use IAeStandardSchemaResolver
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def Classes that represent WSDL elements (partner links, port types, properties, and the like) and that serialize and deserialize them.  
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.castor Classes to integrate the Castor schema reader with the WSDL locator.  
 

Uses of IAeStandardSchemaResolver in org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def that implement IAeStandardSchemaResolver
 class AeStandardSchemaResolver
          This implemenation of a standard schema resolver knows how to resolve standard schemas from within the context of the AWF Designer.
